TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProjectItemInstance extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2

summary.span: 包装计算项以进行生成。

span.span: Wraps an evaluated item for build purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不存储项元素信息，因为已经执行所有计算和验证。Does not store item element information, because all evaluation and verification has already been performed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool HasMetadata(string name) cil managed
Public Function HasMetadata (name As String) As Boolean

span.span: The name of the metadata.

summary.span: 确定是否在此项上定义了具有给定名称的元数据（即使其值是空字符串）。

span.span: Determines whether the metadata with the given name is defined on this item (even if its value is empty string).

returns.span: 如果在此项上定义了具有给定名称的元数据（即使其值是空字符串），则返回 true；否则返回 false。

span.span: Returns true if the metadata with the given name is defined on this item (even if its value is empty string); false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这会搜索内置的元数据和元数据从项定义，因为此方法使用对于批处理，其中并不重要的元数据的出处。This searches built-in metadata and metadata from item definitions, because this method is used for batching, where it doesn't matter where the metadata originated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法对此进行设置，因为它用作到项目的项表中的键。This cannot be set, as it is used as the key into the project's items table.

The collection of custom metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 不包括内置的元数据。Does not include built-in metadata. - 此方法应返回的元数据的克隆。This method should return a clone of the metadata. - 写入到此字典应不会反映在基础的项。Writing to this dictionary should not be reflected in the underlying item.

param.name: destinationItem
param.span: 元数据项要复制到的项。

summary.span: ITaskItem 实现。

span.span: ITaskItem implementation.

summary.span: 将自定义的元数据项复制到另一个项。

span.span: Copies the custom metadata entries to another item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应遵循以下原则实现此方法。Follow the guidelines below when implementing this method. - 不会覆盖属性。Do not overwrite the property. - 不会覆盖现有的元数据条目。Do not overwrite existing metadata entries. - 不要复制元数据条目的没有意义上的目标项。Do not copy metadata entries that do not make sense on the destination item.

summary.span: 获取或设置项规范。

span.span: Gets or sets the item specification.
The item specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项规范是一个任意字符串。The item specification is an arbitrary string. 如果该项表示磁盘上的文件，项规范将该文件的路径。If the item represents a file on disk, the item specification will be the path of that file. 文件是一个项目中的以下项声明`File.cs`。The for the following item declaration in a project file is `File.cs`. ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示创建一个或多个目录的任务的代码。The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories. [!code-csharp[msbuild_MakeDirTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_MakeDirTask/CS/msbuild_MakeDirTask.cs#1)]
